cause.description:
The Chinese have raped the lands not belonging to them. Tibet for Tibetans! The PRC invaded a peace loving nation and brutally destroyed Buddhist monestaries and killed monks. Even more disturbing, driving out the political and religious leader, the 14th Dalai Lhama.
BOYCOTT BEIJING
Join this cause to revolt against PRC and all other Han Chinese supporters.
1. Encourage political negociations with the 14th Dalai Lhama
2. End the destruction of Tibetan Buddhism
3. Preserve economic and cultural independence from
4. Expose Chinese lies
cause.mission: Save Tibet's unique geography, culture, and religion from domination from the People's Republic of China
cause.name: Save Tibet
